TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ViewStateException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ViewStateException Inherits Exception
public ref class ViewStateException sealed : Exception
type ViewStateException = class inherit Exception interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示当无法加载或验证视图状态时引发的异常。

span.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when the view state cannot be loaded or validated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在页面加载视图状态信息时发生异常，则该页将创建一个 对象并将其作为内部异常传递到 异常中。If an exception occurs when the page loads the view-state information, the page creates a object and passes it as an inner exception within an exception. 此 异常将被重新引发，由应用程序进行处理。The exception is re-thrown to be handled by the application. 类在属性中存储有关异常的信息 。The class stores information about the exception in the property. 如果请求有权访问 属性，则 属性将包含从、、、、和属性返回的值 ; 否则，该 属性将包含一个一般视图状态错误消息。If the request has permission to access the property, then the property contains the values returned from the , , , , , and properties; otherwise, the property contains a generic view-state error message. 视图状态异常可能是 (MAC) 验证错误的消息身份验证代码的结果。A view-state exception can be the result of a Message Authentication Codes (MAC) validation error. 如果将页属性 `enableViewStateMac` 设置为 `true` ，则使用 MAC 标识符对视图状态信息进行编码。If the page attribute `enableViewStateMac` is set to `true`, view-state information is encoded with a MAC identifier. 当视图状态信息回发到服务器时，页面将验证编码以确保用户未对其进行更改。When the view-state information is posted back to the server, the page verifies the encoding to ensure that it has not been altered by the user. 如果该页无法在视图状态信息上验证 MAC 编码，则会引发异常，并将 对象作为内部异常。If the page cannot validate the MAC encoding on the view-state information, it will throw an exception with the object as an inner exception. 要使 MAC 验证成功，必须在发送和接收视图状态信息时，使用相同的密钥对其进行哈希处理。For MAC validation to succeed, the view-state information must be hashed by the same key when it is sent and received. 在 Web 场中，每台服务器上的计算机密钥都应该设置为一个公用密钥。Within a Web farm, the machine key on each server should be set to a common key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个方法，该方法可对 base64 编码的字符串进行反序列化，并返回 属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 此 方法可能会引发一个 异常，其中包含 作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获 异常并从对象中检索属性 。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

value.span: 如果客户端仍连接在服务器上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client is still connected to the server; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值与调用属性的值相同 。This property returns the same value as calling the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个方法，该方法可对 base64 编码的字符串进行反序列化，并返回 属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 此 方法可能会引发一个 异常，其中包含 作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获 异常并从对象中检索属性 。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. summary.span: 获取导致视图状态异常的 HTTP 请求的调试信息。

span.span: Gets debugging information about the HTTP request that resulted in a view-state exception.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含格式化消息以及有关异常的信息。

span.span: A containing the formatted message with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果请求没有访问服务器变量的权限，则此属性将返回一个一般视图状态错误消息。If the request does not have permission to access the server variables, then this property returns a generic view-state error message. 如果请求确实有权访问服务器变量，则属性将 包含从、、、、 和 属性返回的值。If the request does have permission to access server variables, the property contains the values returned from the , , , , , and properties.

summary.span: 获取导致视图状态异常的 HTTP 请求的路径。

span.span: Gets the path of the HTTP request that resulted in a view-state exception.
A containing the path from the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值与属性中的变量的值相同 `PATH_INFO` 。This property returns the same value as the `PATH_INFO` variable in the property. 它将返回路径的部分。It returns the portion of the path after the host name. 例如，在 URL 中 `http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html` ， 会返回/virdir/page.html。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html`, would return /virdir/page.html. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个方法，该方法可对 base64 编码的字符串进行反序列化，并返回 属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 此 方法可能会引发一个 异常，其中包含 作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获 异常并从对象中检索属性 。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets the contents of the view-state string that, when read, caused the view-state exception.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含导致视图状态异常的视图状态值。

span.span: A containing the view-state values that caused the view-state exception.

summary.span: 获取页的 URL，该页链接到发生视图状态异常的页。

span.span: Gets the URL of the page that linked to the page where the view-state exception occurred.
A containing the HTTP referrer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值与属性中的变量的值相同 `HTTP_REFERER` 。This property returns the same value as the `HTTP_REFERER` variable in the property. 如果以前没有链接到该页的请求，则该值为空字符串 ( "" ) 。The value is an empty string ("") if no previous request linked to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个方法，该方法可对 base64 编码的字符串进行反序列化，并返回 属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 此 方法可能会引发一个 异常，其中包含 作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获 异常并从对象中检索属性 。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object.
